extracto: I provide technological solutions based on software development and team leadership, extensive experience with the implementation of Cloud solutions using agile methodologies. I was a main part of the AWS 2018 success story team, and a member of the development team of the historical Cloud solutions for pension fund withdrawals of AFPs and Chilean insurers, I currently work as Tech Lead in a digital transformation project that without doubt it will be the new success of the industry.

laboral.otros: JIRA Service Desk, Angular, NodeJS, Serverless, AWS (S3, SQS, Lambda), Socket.io, Git, Javascript/Typescript, GCP, Azure, Dockers
laboral.extracto: Development of web applications for different clients, using frameworks such as Angular and React. Basic management in Cloud infrastructures (AWS and Azure). Carrying out activities as Tech Lead, supporting the team in managing activities, constantly seeking team growth through continuous feedback, maintaining fluid communications with the areas involved.

Development of internal process management applications in logistics and documentation issues for different supplier, active participation in analysis of requierements and design of computer systems, also providing support to them along with training for operators.
actividades: Análisis de requerimientos y especificaciones técnicas.
Diseño lógico y físico de programación
Modelado de base de datos, Actualización, Administración y Mantención de sistemas.
Soporte a usuarios vía remoto y presencial, Capacitaciones.

laboral.extracto: Prototype development (JAVA SE, PHP, HTML, VBA) to improve internal management in logistics and documentary processes.
